definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path

sentences.english: There is no such thing as a self-cleaning oven.
sentences.chinese: 世界上还没有会自动清洁的炉灶。

sentences.english: Keep foods away from ranges or refrigerator exhausts.
sentences.chinese: 保持食物远离炉灶或冰箱的排气管。

sentences.english: Solar cookers, or ovens , have been used for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 太阳能饮具或炉灶已经被用了几百年。

sentences.english: Does such an administration operate within the political system, or supplant it?
sentences.chinese: 这种管治是在既有政制中运作，抑或另起炉灶？

sentences.english: Chufang use of solar energy Stoves, circular saws and diamond films.
sentences.chinese: 橱房用太阳能炉灶，及金刚石圆锯片。

sentences.english: Distance between ventilation hood and gas cooktop at least 760 mm.
sentences.chinese: 之间的通风罩和天然气炉灶距离至少760毫米。

sentences.english: My mother, on the other hand, sought refuge in front of our home stove.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我的母亲把我们家的炉灶前当作是避难所。

sentences.english: Kitchen stove oven with integrated cooktop can in western cooking.
sentences.chinese: 厨房内有炉灶烤箱一体的灶具，能烹制中西餐。

sentences.english: Some modern stoves are so clean-burning that they can even be used in smoke-free zones.
sentences.chinese: 一些现代的炉灶甚至清洁到可以在无烟区域使用。

sentences.english: It also conducts community education and is involved in promoting safer stoves and candle holders.
sentences.chinese: 它还开展社区教育并参与推广更安全的炉灶和烛台。

sentences.english: Mass introduction of such stoves could deliver multiple green-economy benefits.
sentences.chinese: 大规模引进这种炉灶可以带来多种绿色经济的利益。

sentences.english: The invention provides an energy saving kitchen range belonging to the field of fuel gas stove.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供一种节能灶头，属于燃气炉灶领域。

sentences.english: The little bell of the timer on the stove took up a show-spaced pinging .
sentences.chinese: 炉灶上计时器的小铃发出了一阵不急不徐的铃铃声。

sentences.english: All of the White Stoves we have looked at up until this point have one of the below problems to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 我们看过的所有的白炉灶在某种程度上都有下列问题。

sentences.english: The bathroom is on your left, the kitchenette on the right, equipped with stove and refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 浴室在你的左手边，小厨房在右边，备有炉灶及冰箱。

sentences.english: This equipment is the oven is also burn wood block a miniature generators.
sentences.chinese: 该设备既是烧柴块的炉灶也是一台微型发电机。

definition: to make a fire/to light a fire
large kitchen stove made from bricks or earth/(PRC) ordinary mess hall (lowest dining standard, ranked below 中灶[zhong1 zao4] for mid-level cadres and 小灶[xiao3 zao4] for the most privileged)
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
